books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: The bounty hunter Stephanie Plum juggles investigating a crime in an ice cream factory and the two men in her life.
books.name: TURBO TWENTY-THREE

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: John Puller, a special agent with the Army, searches for the truth about his mother, who disappeared 30  years ago.
books.name: NO MAN'S LAND

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A whistleblower alerts a Florida investigator to judicial corruption involving the Mob and Indian casinos.
books.name: THE WHISTLER

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher, still in the Army, becomes involved in an investigation with elite agents from the F.B.I. and C.I.A.
books.name: NIGHT SCHOOL

books.author: by Patricia Cornwell
books.description: In the 24th novel in this series, the forensic pathologist Kay Scarpetta investigates a death that seems to have been (but was not) caused by lightning. Is her old nemesis Carrie Grethen involved?
books.name: CHAOS

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Dirk Cussler
books.description: Trying to locate an Ottoman shipwreck, the NUMA director Dirk Pitt encounters more than he expected.
books.name: ODESSA SEA

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark and Alafair Burke
books.description: A woman just released from prison begs Laurie Morgan, the producer of the TV show “Under Suspicion,” to help clear her name.
books.name: THE SLEEPING BEAUTY KILLER

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: Harry Bosch helps track a serial rapist, while as a P.I. he aids a billionaire in search of a possible heir.
books.name: THE WRONG SIDE OF GOODBYE

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: A medical crisis entangles a black nurse, a white supremacist father and a white lawyer.
books.name: SMALL GREAT THINGS

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A man who became a single father when his marriage and business collapsed learns to take a chance on a new love.
books.name: TWO BY TWO

books.author: by James Luceno
books.description: This novel sets the stage for “Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,” to be released this month.
books.name: CATALYST

books.author: by Richard Paul Evans
books.description: A man struggling with the aftermath of a divorce sets out to find the anonymous writer of a blog about loneliness, and discovers more than he expected.
books.name: THE MISTLETOE SECRET

books.author: by Stephenie Meyer
books.description: A specialist in chemically controlled torture takes on one last job — pursuing a man with whom she joins forces.
books.name: THE CHEMIST
